document.full_text: china has agreed to steps to open its government procurement market to more u.s. companies and let u.s. banks sell mutual funds in the country, a senior u.s. treasury official said on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. says china agrees market-opening steps
lines_and_colors: china has agreed to steps to open its government procurement market to more u.s. companies and let u.s. banks sell mutual funds in the country, a senior u.s. treasury official said on tuesday.
